text: William Lynn Ogg (May 17, 1937 - September 10, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the Ohio House of Representatives from 1995 to 2002. His district was located in Scioto County, Ohio. He was born in Portsmouth, Ohio. Ogg was a member of the Democratic Party. Ogg died on September 10, 2020 in Portsmouth at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Ohio Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: William L. Ogg
